text_block_list.name: Doctor
text_block_list.text:
Fortunately, we were able to treat it<n>early and it is
non-life-threatening, but<n>I cannot recommend that she
continue<n>work as a trainer.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I see... Well, I knew that this day<n>would come sooner or
later. I'm sorry,<n>Bell.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I-it's nothing you need to apologize<n>for!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
If anything, it should be me for not<n>getting any stronger this
whole time...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Given the circumstances, it is decided<n>that it is best that the
chief trainer<n>moves on to retirement.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: <username>, I'd like you to take over.<n>I trust you.

text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer
text_block_list.text: If it's you, I know that things will be<n>just fine.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her official retirement comes into<n>effect two weeks from
now. I've<n>accepted the job of chief trainer, but it<n>is up to
Mejiro Dober if she wishes to<n>stay.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
For that reason, I make an effort to<n>better understand her
feelings.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Sorry, but can this wait? I'd like to<n>focus on my training right
now.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry, but can we talk about this<n>another time? I'd like
to concentrate<n>on my training right now.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
She placed all her faith in me, but I<n>was never able to even
give her one<n>win. I need to change that before it's<n>too late.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
She placed all her faith in me, but I<n>was never able to even
give her one<n>win. I need to change that before it's<n>too late.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I only have two weeks, so I need to<n>do everything I can
right now.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
For the next few days, I'm busy with<n>the handover and
have little time for<n>much else.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
When those tasks finally come to an<n>end, I can't help but
think of Mejiro<n>Dober.
choice_data_list: I really should go check in on her.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff...
choice_data_list: Dober!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Eh? You...
choice_data_list: Dober, isn't this a bit too much?
Dober, isn't this a bit too much?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Eh? Oh, Assistant Trainer...
choice_data_list: Dober, isn't this a bit too much?
Dober, isn't this a bit too much?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Shut up! Leave me alone!
choice_data_list: But if you push yourself like this...
But if you push yourself like this...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Please, would you leave me be? I told<n>you that I don't have
much time!
choice_data_list: But if you push yourself like this...
But if you push yourself like this...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I HAVE to push myself. BecauseI'm so weak!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I HAVE to push myself. BecauseI'm so weak!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I've always, always been soweak!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I thought I would be able to start<n>winning right away. To be
able to run<n>with confidence like Bright... To be as<n>strong as
Ryan...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
As a member of the Mejiro family,<n>there's so much I want
to prove. But<n>I...

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text:
And we have our first-place finisher!<n>The other runners
follow close behind!<n>Everyone, a big round of applause for<n>
everyone giving it their best!

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Oh, number 8 Mejiro Dober is<n>rounding the last turn! She
was a little<n>late out of the gate, but she hasn't<n>given up!

text_block_list.name: Young Dober
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... huff...

text_block_list.name: Spectators
text_block_list.text:
You're doing your best! Just keep it<n>up! Just a little farther!
You can do it!

text_block_list.name: Young Dober
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... gasp...

text_block_list.name: Young Dober
text_block_list.text:
Doing your best? "Keep it up"? "It's<n>okay"? I've never
heard anyone say<n>those things to Ryan and the others...

text_block_list.name: Young Dober
text_block_list.text:
They always yell about how fast and<n>amazing Bright and
Ryan are... But not<n>for me...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
That was a devastating day for me. I<n>messed up at the start
and finished<n>practically a whole lap behind<n>everyone else.
I've felt that others<n>have been laughing at me ever since.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I always feel ashamed and<n>powerless... My heart starts to
feel<n>like it's trying to escape my chest,<n>and my legs begin
to feel like they're<n>not even my own...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
That's why I can't run properly in<n>front of people anymore!
No one else<n>at the academy is like this!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I felt myself getting slightly better with<n>Trainer's guidance,
but now I'm going<n>to lose her too!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
So I have to do something! I have to<n>win a race, even if it
means pushing<n>myself this hard!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I'm such a weakling, but I have to<n>change that even if I
have to do it<n>alone!
choice_data_list: You won't be alone.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: What?
choice_data_list: I'm here to support you.
I'm here to support you.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
You mean to say that things will be<n>okay if you take over as
my trainer?<n>That things will work out? Don't<n>make me
laugh!
choice_data_list:
It's because you are an extremely capable
runner!

It's because you are an extremely capable
runner!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Have you even been listening to<n>anything I've been
saying?! I'm a<n>weakling, and I always have been!
choice_data_list: You've also never given up.
You've also never given up.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Keep going, keep goooing! Aaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I just know that I would face a repeat<n>of that scrimmage
race if I just let<n>things be, however.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I just know that I would face a repeat<n>of that scrimmage
race if I just let<n>things be, however.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
So I was thinking that talking to you<n>could be some good
mental training<n>for me! You can do that much as my<n>
assistant trainer, right?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
So I was hoping... maybe I could talk<n>with you to help me
build some mental<n>fortitude. Would that be okay?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
She placed all her faith in me, but I<n>was never able to even
give her one<n>win. I need to change that before it's<n>too late.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
She placed all her faith in me, but I<n>was never able to even
give her one<n>win. I need to change that before it's<n>too late.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I only have two weeks, so I need to<n>do everything I can
right now.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She hasn't given up this entire time,<n>chasing after her goal
of winning a<n>race in front of the eyes of many.
choice_data_list:
Someone who doesn't give up cannot possibly
be a weakling.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Gasp!
choice_data_list: Mejiro Dober, you are an incredible racer.
Mejiro Dober, you are an incredible racer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I... I'm not...
choice_data_list: Dober! I'll be waiting for you!
Dober! I'll be waiting for you!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I believe in her capabilities, even if<n>she chooses to polish
them alone. I<n>want her to understand, though, that if<n>she
needs any support, then I'll be<n>waiting.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I try my best to make that known to<n>her as she dashes
away into the<n>night.
